title: Capstone Course for Leadership and Management Competency Development for Pharmacy Students

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational pharmacy knowledge and basic team project experience
context.additional_context: Project-based learning environment reflecting actual pharmacy/medical settings. Collaboration via personal devices through BYOD

learning_goals: Students design and execute a team project to solve real-world pharmaceutical problems within 8 weeks, demonstrating leadership competencies.
Students achieve over 70% proficiency in evaluating management skills such as time management, resource allocation, and conflict resolution during the project process.
Learners improve collaborative competencies by at least 3 levels through peer assessment and mentor feedback (based on a 5-point Likert scale).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
